site_name: SAVE THEM ALL, LIFESAVERS RESCUE TRANSPORT

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:14am on May 24,
2023.
Upon arrival to the facility, the inspector attempted to contact the registrant via the phone number on file, and was unable
to leave a voicemail due to a full mailbox. The inspector waited 30 minutes before leaving the facility.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:14am on May 24, 
2023. 
 
Upon arrival to the facility, the inspector attempted to contact the registrant via the phone number on file, and was unable 
to leave a voicemail due to a full mailbox. The inspector waited 30 minutes before leaving the facility. 
 
 
 
End Section
